query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `twDataSyncErrors` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `dataType` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `source` enum('TWSE', 'TPEx', 'FinMind') NOT NULL,
  `symbol` varchar(10),
  `errorType` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `errorMessage` text NOT NULL,
  `errorStack` text,
  `retryCount` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX `dataType_idx` (`dataType`),
  INDEX `source_idx` (`source`),
  INDEX `symbol_idx` (`symbol`),
  INDEX `createdAt_idx` (`createdAt`)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3tyUrnEAZmgrWaW.7957998e07fb --database KzRzifpe7R9Hr8c3sVfR6n --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `twDataSyncErrors` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `dataType` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `source` enum('TWSE', 'TPEx', 'FinMind') NOT NULL,
  `symbol` varchar(10),
  `errorType` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `errorMessage` text NOT NULL,
  `errorStack` text,
  `retryCount` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX `dataType_idx` (`dataType`),
  INDEX `source_idx` (`source`),
  INDEX `symbol_idx` (`symbol`),
  INDEX `createdAt_idx` (`createdAt`)
);
